data.title: Dancing Ferret Press
data.meta_description: Publisher of print and e-books with stories from far corners of this earth and worlds beyond.
data.text:
Even Goblins Get The Blues

You may order the book from a number of sellers, including Amazon with Prime Shipping. Ordering directly from us is always preferred. Billing and shipping fulfilled by The MTG Place. At the present time, physical book offers are for US customers only.

Physical Book: This package includes a book that will be shipped to you via Media Mail. Includes shipping. $17.50

Physical Book, Fast Shipping This package includes a book that will be shipped to you via Priority Mail. Includes shipping. $20.50

Add your choice of two stellar CDs to any book order above. The Neil Gaiman album "Where's Neil When You Need Him?" features text by Neil, art by Dave McKean and music by Tori Amos, Rasputina, Future Bible Heroes and many others. Or choose the Dark Kingdom: Dragon King movie soundtrack, featuring E Nomine, Corvus Corax, Schandmaul, Faun, Xandria, Das Ich and more. Your CD will ship together with your book.
